Name: Apple Martini (with apple schnapps)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with apple wedge on rim.
Review: There are as many different recipes for this drink as there are varieties of apple and brands of apple liqueur: this one was popular in the UK during the Noughties .
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Martini (with apple schnapps) contains 166 calories
